CREATE TABLE #tptwa ( [id] [int] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL , [summa] [money] ) ON [PRIMARY]
insert into #tptwa (name, summa) select Tarifs.[name] as [Тариф], sum(SessionsAdd2.summa) as [Сумма] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (Sessions.id = SessionsAdd.idSessions) inner join SessionsAdd2 on (SessionsAdd.id = SessionsAdd2.idSessionsAdd) inner join Tarifs on (SessionsAdd.idTarif = Tarifs.id) where (SessionsAdd2.[moment] >= %TIME-START%) and (SessionsAdd2.[moment] <= %TIME-STOP%) and (idClients = 0)
group by Tarifs.[name]
insert into #tptwa (name, summa) values ('------',0)
insert into #tptwa (name, summa) select 'Итого:', sum(SessionsAdd2.summa) as [Сумма] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (Sessions.id = SessionsAdd.idSessions) inner join SessionsAdd2 on (SessionsAdd.id = SessionsAdd2.idSessionsAdd) where (SessionsAdd2.[moment] >= %TIME-START%) and (SessionsAdd2.[moment] <= %TIME-STOP%) select name [Тариф], summa [Сумма] from #tptwa order by id
if object_id('tempdb..#tptwa') is not null DROP TABLE #tptwa
